title: Self-Defense Workshop for Women
description: Join us for a practical self-defense workshop tailored for women. This workshop will teach basic self-defense techniques, ways to stay aware of your surroundings, and how to respond to potential threats. No previous experience is necessary.
topics: Personal safety tips in public spaces
speakers: Amina Suleiman:Expert in Women’s Safety and Martial Arts
speakers1: Fatima Musa:Community Organizer and GBV Advocate
